originalText.text: My family has been going to A&A for 4 generations now I have nothing to say negative about the store or their sales ppl Lou has been handling all my designs n jewelry for years his father took care of my grand parents then their children then me and now my kids I always get compliments on how beautiful my jewelry is. They’re the BEST!!!

text.text: My family has been going to A&A for 4 generations now I have nothing to say negative about the store or their sales ppl Lou has been handling all my designs n jewelry for years his father took care of my grand parents then their children then me and now my kids I always get compliments on how beautiful my jewelry is. They’re the BEST!!!

originalText.text: Lou is so great!  Very knowledgeable,  incredibly patient and so helpful!  He never steers me wrong, and has more than fair pricing. I look at other booths, but I always come back to Lou.

text.text: Lou is so great!  Very knowledgeable,  incredibly patient and so helpful!  He never steers me wrong, and has more than fair pricing. I look at other booths, but I always come back to Lou.

originalText.text:
Lou is the Man!….35 years ago when I bought a ring for my Bride and again today with my future Son in Law and Daughter becoming engaged. Lou is a total gentleman and follows up on everything he says. His prices are very fair and his diamonds are of great quality. You can buy with confidence knowing you are dealing with a very reputable snd honest individual who aims to please his customers in every way. Thank you Lou for all your patience and support. You made it a real pleasure for my Family. I am sincerely grateful for all your hard work and efforts. I am looking forward to seeing you again for the next engagement! All the best Lou!
Victor Pucci

originalText.text: Lou was very patient and helpful in assisting me in selecting what I wanted. I had a good idea of what I was looking for but he helped me to narrow it down. The pricing was reasonable and my ring came in very quickly once I ordered it. Highly recommended!
